title: I was expecting more like the stars from metacritic
review: The results is disappointing. The movie is scary but the timing is a big no for me. I love watching horror movies since I was kid but not with the long duration of minutes of waiting until the next scene to appear and just to listen those disturbing noisy backsound with the same notes for few minutes which made me feel real bad. Was that maybe because I am a little bit of asperger? Listeing to a same notes for more than a minute made my mind sick.
